subject: Tennis
lead_paragraph: Third-seeded Gilles Simon lost at the Open Sud de France in Montpellier, struggling to return Dustin Brown’s serves in a 6-4, 6-4 defeat.
snippet: Third-seeded Gilles Simon lost at the Open Sud de France in Montpellier, struggling to return Dustin Brown’s serves in a 6-4, 6-4 defeat.
